entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:02 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:02 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:02 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
